snippet: Vatican experts said the move was a strong sign that Francis was eager to consult widely and promote greater dialogue between the Vatican hierarchy and churches worldwide.
abstract: Pope Francis names eight cardinals from around world to advisory panel in radical step toward more democracy in Roman Catholic Church.

byline.original: By GAIA PIANIGIANI and RACHEL DONADIO
byline.contributor: Gaia Pianigiani reported from Vatican City, and Rachel Donadio from Athens.

lead_paragraph: Vatican experts said the move was a strong sign that Francis was eager to consult widely and promote greater dialogue between the Vatican hierarchy and churches worldwide.

headline.seo: Pope Francis Names Advisory Panel at Vatican
headline.main: Pope Francis Names Advisory Panel at Vatican
headline.print_headline: Pope Names an Advisory Panel of Cardinals
